Thanks to all those suggesting me practical design
solutions. As to TestListener, I also had somebody's
practical advise not to implement it. But I still
wonder, be it only an idle theoretical interest, how
to include into game my TestListener implementation
class. And that being done, what is a call cycle
difference between TestListener.startTest() and
Test.setUp()? To my understanding they are both event
methods called before every test method in a TestCase.
